Copy constructor, makes a deep copy of another Context.

Controller - Class in controller
Controller is the main external interface of this application.
Controller(Context, IView) - Constructor for class controller.Controller
The Controller keeps a reference to a Context object providing access to application state for commands and a reference to a IView, allowing commands to interact with the user interface.
